text: I urge my colleagues in Congress to pass the Dream and Promise Act now so we can provide permanent protection for our young people and their families, who have done so much for this country.
That group includes Dreamer constituents, like Cinthya Yamileth Moran, who has been a model volunteer in her community of Rockdale County and aspires to become a cardiovascular surgeon.

We must also not forget that many of the Dreamers graduating high school this year are not eligible under the existing rules. We must do better. I stand with Cinthya and all my DACA brothers and sisters in celebrating the anniversary of this program.
